page.title: 06Daily Life
page.content: At 1 0 'clock we go in and do some craft until 2.25 then we go out to play again.When we come in our teacher reads us a story.Then at 3.15 a taxi comes to takes some children home.At 3.25 another taxi comes to take more children home.At 3.30 the rest of the children go home.When we get home we read ,some children ride horses then at about 5.00 we have tea mum cooks the food on an electric cooker and makes us a drink of coffee with the coffee maker.Then we watch the colour television.Then at 8.30 we have our supper.Then when we have finished our supper I help mum wash up and then I go to bed at 9.00 and at 9.15 I finally get to sleep.
